scripts.minify: terser lib/basescene.js lib/preload.js lib/loadlazy.js lib/mainmenu.js lib/Objects/Cards.js lib/Objects/Characters.js lib/Objects/Buttons.js lib/Objects/TextBoxes.js lib/Objects/Actions.js lib/level*.js lib/endscene.js lib/config.js -c -m -o lib/game.min.js
scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run minify && npm run clean
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m "Auto-commit" && git push origin main
